option.modEnabled.name: Mod Enabled
option.openMenuKey.name: Open Menu Hotkey
option.openMenuKey.tooltip: Press this key to open this config menu directly.
option.speedMultiplier.name: Speed Multiplier
option.speedMultiplier.tooltip: Movement speed multiplier. 1.0 = normal, 2.0 = 2x speed, 10.0 = 10x speed.
option.addedSpeedBonus.name: Added Speed Bonus
option.addedSpeedBonus.tooltip: Flat speed bonus added to base movement. Like having permanent speed buff.
option.noClip.name: No Clip
option.noClip.tooltip: Walk through walls, buildings, and all obstacles.
option.alwaysRun.name: Always Run
option.infiniteStamina.name: Infinite Stamina
option.infiniteStamina.tooltip: Never get tired. Stamina always stays at max.
option.infiniteHealth.name: Infinite Health (Invincibility)
option.infiniteHealth.tooltip: Never die. Health always stays at max. Complete invincibility!
option.maxStaminaOverride.name: Max Stamina Override
option.maxHealthOverride.name: Max Health Override
option.staminaRegenPerSecond.name: Stamina Regen Per Second
option.staminaRegenPerSecond.tooltip: How much stamina regenerates every second. 0 = none.
option.healthRegenPerSecond.name: Health Regen Per Second
option.healthRegenPerSecond.tooltip: How much health regenerates every second. 0 = none.
option.oneHitKill.name: One Hit Kill
option.oneHitKill.tooltip: All enemies die in one hit.
option.alwaysCrit.name: 100% Critical Chance
option.damageMultiplier.name: Damage Multiplier
option.damageMultiplier.tooltip: Multiply all weapon damage. 1.0 = normal, 5.0 = 5x damage.
option.critDamageMultiplier.name: Crit Damage Multiplier
option.addedAttack.name: Added Attack
option.addedDefense.name: Added Defense
option.addedImmunity.name: Added Immunity
option.invincibilityDuration.name: Invincibility Duration (ms)
option.invincibilityDuration.tooltip: How long you're invincible after getting hit. Default 1200ms.
option.noMonsterSpawns.name: No Monster Spawns
option.noMonsterSpawns.tooltip: Removes all monsters from the current location.
option.toolAreaMultiplier.name: Tool Area Multiplier
option.toolAreaMultiplier.tooltip: Multiply the area affected by hoe/watering can. 1 = normal, 3 = 3x3, 5 = 5x5.
option.toolPowerOverride.name: Tool Power Override
option.toolPowerOverride.tooltip: Force tool charge level. -1 = normal, 0-5 = power level.
option.noToolStaminaCost.name: No Tool Stamina Cost
option.infiniteWater.name: Infinite Water
option.axePowerBonus.name: Axe Power Bonus
option.axePowerBonus.tooltip: Additional power for axe. Makes chopping easier.
option.pickaxePowerBonus.name: Pickaxe Power Bonus
option.pickaxePowerBonus.tooltip: Additional power for pickaxe. Makes mining easier.
option.magneticRadiusMultiplier.name: Magnetic Radius Multiplier
option.magneticRadiusMultiplier.tooltip: Item pickup range multiplier. 1.0 = normal, 5.0 = 5x range.
option.addedMagneticRadius.name: Added Magnetic Radius
option.addedMagneticRadius.tooltip: Flat bonus to pickup range in pixels. 128 = 2 tiles.
option.infiniteItems.name: Infinite Items
option.infiniteItems.tooltip: Items don't get consumed when used. (Experimental)
option.xpMultiplier.name: XP Multiplier
option.xpMultiplier.tooltip: Multiply all XP gains. 1.0 = normal, 100 = 100x XP, 1000 = instant level ups!
option.farmingLevelOverride.name: Farming Level Override
option.miningLevelOverride.name: Mining Level Override
option.foragingLevelOverride.name: Foraging Level Override
option.fishingLevelOverride.name: Fishing Level Override
option.combatLevelOverride.name: Combat Level Override
option.alwaysMaxLuck.name: Always Max Luck
option.alwaysMaxLuck.tooltip: Every day is the luckiest day possible. Applies immediately.
option.dailyLuckOverride.name: Daily Luck Override
option.dailyLuckOverride.tooltip: Set exact daily luck. -1.0 = disabled, range -0.1 to 0.12. Applies immediately.
option.instantFishBite.name: Instant Fish Bite
option.instantFishBite.tooltip: Fish bite immediately when you cast.
option.instantCatch.name: Instant Catch
option.maxFishQuality.name: Max Fish Quality
option.maxFishQuality.tooltip: All caught fish are iridium quality.
option.alwaysFindTreasure.name: Always Find Treasure
option.forceForageQuality.name: Force Forage Quality
option.forceForageQuality.tooltip: Force quality of all foraged items. -1=disabled, 0=normal, 1=silver, 2=gold, 4=iridium. Only affects forageables that naturally have quality.
option.sellPriceMultiplier.name: Sell Price Multiplier
option.sellPriceMultiplier.tooltip: Multiply prices when selling. 1.0 = normal, 2.0 = 2x profit.
option.buyPriceMultiplier.name: Buy Price Multiplier
option.buyPriceMultiplier.tooltip: Multiply prices when buying. 1.0 = normal, 0.5 = half price, 0 = free.
option.friendshipMultiplier.name: Friendship Multiplier
option.noFriendshipDecay.name: No Friendship Decay
option.freezeTime.name: Freeze Time
option.freezeTimeIndoors.name: Freeze Time Indoors
option.freezeTimeIndoors.tooltip: Time stops when you're inside buildings.
option.neverPassOut.name: Never Pass Out
option.neverPassOut.tooltip: Stay awake past 2am without passing out.
option.maxAnimalHappiness.name: Max Animal Happiness
option.maxAnimalHappiness.tooltip: All farm animals are always at max happiness and friendship.
option.cropsNeverDie.name: Crops Never Die
option.cropsNeverDie.tooltip: Crops survive season changes and lack of water.
option.instantCropGrowth.name: Instant Crop Growth
option.instantCropGrowth.tooltip: All crops across all locations grow to full harvest in real-time.
option.instantTreeGrowth.name: Instant Tree Growth
option.instantTreeGrowth.tooltip: All regular trees (oak, maple, pine, etc.) grow to full size in real-time.
option.instantFruitTreeGrowth.name: Instant Fruit Tree Growth
option.instantFruitTreeGrowth.tooltip: All fruit trees grow to full maturity in real-time.
